dmca.title: notice of infringement (NationMaster)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Purplemath [mailto:stapel@purplemath.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, July 05, 2006 2:02 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: FW: notice of infringement (NationMaster)
Subject: Re: FW: notice of infringement (NationMaster)


Dear ThePlanet Copyright Agent,

Thank you for your message.

 > Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement  > notice
does not substantially comply with the required  > notification elements
of the..."DMCA".

Your assessment of our notice to your client is correct. We did not file
a full DMCA notice with ThePlanet, but instead only copied ThePlanet on
our query to the client in question, in hopes of resolving the issue on
a friendly basis.

We will assume, from your message above, that you would prefer that we
deal with ThePlanet directly, and file the DMCA notification in full.
Therefore, you are being provided with the following information:

==============================================
==============================================

1) The following is an electronic copy of the signature of the
Purplemath copyright owner:

/Elizabeth Stapel/

As the copyright owner, Elizabeth Stapel is authorized to speak on the
behalf of the copyright owner.

Copyright Registration Numbers TX 5-725-275, TX 5-804-898, and TX
5-956-884; statutory damages may apply:

http://www.purplemath.com/2004_copyright.pdf
http://www.purplemath.com/terms.htm

==============================================

2) The identity of the copyrighted materials infringed:

http://www.purplemath.com/modules/complex.htm

==============================================

3) The identity of the material claimed to be an infringement:

http://www.nationmaster.com/encyclopedia/Imaginary-number
(everything between the "copied from open source website" header and the
"e^(ix) = cosx + isinx" graphic)

==============================================

4) Information reasonably sufficient to allow the online service
provider to contact the complaining party:

   Elizabeth Stapel
   2944 East Edgewood Avenue
   Mesa AZ  85204-4705

   Purplemath.com
   P.O. Box 8584
   Mesa AZ 85214-8584

   480.830.4927

   stapel@purplemath.com

==============================================

5) Statement that the complaining party has "a good faith belief that
use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent or the law."

"I, Elizabeth Stapel, creator and owner of the lessons content and
images on all the pages listed at:

http://www.purplemath.com/

...have never given permission to Luke Metcalfe, Rapid Intelligence,
NationMaster, ThePlanet, or their agents to copy, mirror,
download/upload, frame, rework, or otherwise present my work, or
derivatives thereof, as his/her/their own.

"I, Elizabeth Stapel, hereby reiterate my good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent or the law."

==============================================

6) Statement that the information in the notice is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the copyright owner.

"To the best of my knowledge, the information I, Elizabeth Stapel, have
hereby presented is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the copyright
owner."

==============================================
==============================================

Please let us know if you need any additional information, or if the
above needs to be reformatted or renumbered in any particular manner.

Thank you.

Sincerely,

Elizabeth Stapel
Purplemath - Your Algebra Resource
http://www.purplemath.com/
